content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun and easy
Good job !
Would suggest changing the name of the `cookie` variable to `cookies`, since it is a count, not a single cookie.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun. Definitely easy enough for a CoC.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It is simple for a clash of code. Fastest or Shortest

Binary output issue
* According to the contribution guidelines, binary outputs should be avoided for clashes. That's exactly the issue with your clash, as it allows only two possible answers (either "MY COOKIES" or that other long reply). Please modify the output requirements to allow for more than two possible answers.

Goal / Input / Output / Constraints
* Please format all variables and constants using the syntax shown here: https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/help-center/statement

* Please present the Input section based on the example shown in the link above.

* "stealed" should be changed to "stolen".

Constraints
* Reduce the limit of 10^9 to reflect the cases better.

Stub generator
* "stealed" should be changed to "stolen".

Cases
* Each test and its corresponding validator should cover the same scenario but with slightly different inputs. Please change all the validators accordingly.

Thanks.
Thank you for your response , I will fix it
Formatting (variables, constants, bold) is still lacking, and the upper limits are still way higher than what the actual input values are.

Goal
* Please format "SAFE", "CHEATER", "EMPTY" and "WARNING" as {{constants}}.

Input
* Line 3: Please format "n" as a [[variable]] and remove the quotation marks.

Output
* Please change "Line i" to "1 or more lines".

* Please format "SAFE", "CHEATER", "EMPTY" and "WARNING" as {{constants}}.

Constraints
* Please change all three instances of 1000 to 10.

Stub generator
* Line 4: Please add a write statement, e.g. write SAFE | CHEATER | WARNING | EMPTY.

Game modes
* Consider disabling Reverse mode as it could be too difficult to guess the task.

Cases
* Test 2: Please change the input such that the output contains 3 lines, including one line of "CHEATER".

* Please remove the trailing newlines from the input of the cases below:
  • Test 1
  • Validator 1
  • Test 2
  • Test 3

* Please remove the trailing newlines from the output of the cases below:
  • Validator 1
  • Validator 4

Thanks.
